Dialogs.DialogContent: Where am I?
Hello stranger, Here is Drak world
What!!? ... who are you?
I'm Luo Priest, a prophet. Hehe, when you speak Before you ask more questions, let's get rid of the trouble first.
Do you mean Goblin? They are just black and white.
Stranger, it seems you are full of confidence. So let's get familiar with the basic operations first.
Hello, I'm Alice.
This is beginner's guide, we will teach you basic control and movement first
Please touch the joystick on the left side of the screen and move it back and forth
Be careful of the enemy, click the button on the right to attack it
Okay, the basic operation of the game is done.
Hero! This is the underground world of the Yasland continent, how did you come here? ?
Since the there is demon come to this world , my ancestors have ordered me to find out the disaster Oscar Warcraft and eradicate it.
You are too arrogant, you can't defeat them now, Hurry, come back here now.
Is the priest Luo asking you to say this?
Okay, since I can't convince you, please do it yourself. But I advise you Don't go to the core area of the Dark World, otherwise you will unforgettable for life time for what you have see!!
Thanks, but I will still go!
Hero I heard you want to go to the core area of dark world
The prophet Jialuo had told me about this, and ordered me to wait for you and to give you some items!
What a great help, thank you in advance
Thanks to the Prophet Luo Priest. Please open your backpack and equip this item.
Okay, thanks in advance!
